sentences.en: "Take That" are the best group in the whole world. So there.
sentences.cn: “接招”乐队是世界上最好的组合，就是这样的。

sentences.en: A changing world has put pressures on the company.
sentences.cn: 日新月异的世界使这家公司感到了压力。

sentences.en: A child may not differentiate between his imagination and the real world.
sentences.cn: 儿童可能无法将自己的幻想与真实世界区分开来。

sentences.en: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.cn: 震惊全世界的罪行

sentences.en: a herb and lemon dressing that's out of this world.
sentences.cn: 芳草和柠檬简直是再好没有的调料。

sentences.en: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.cn: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.en: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.cn: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.en: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.cn: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.en: fossil imprints that look for all the world like motorcycle tracks.
sentences.cn: 化石印痕看起来与汽车的车辙简直一模一样。

sentences.en: He changed our world through the force of his ideas.
sentences.cn: 他通过自己观念的力量改变了我们的世界。

sentences.en: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.cn: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.en: I thought the world of my father.
sentences.cn: 我十分钦佩我的父亲。

sentences.en: I wouldn't miss it for the world.
sentences.cn: 无论如何我也决不错过。

sentences.en: It felt like the loneliest place in the world.
sentences.cn: 感觉这就像是天底下最荒凉的地方。

sentences.en: It is probably the most polluted body of water in the world.
sentences.cn: 这很可能是世界上受污染最严重的一片水域。

sentences.en: Many of the clothes come from the world's top fashion houses.
sentences.cn: 这些服装中有很多出自世界顶级时装设计公司。

sentences.en: now all the world and his wife seems to have heard of them.
sentences.cn: 现在所有的人似乎都已听说那些事。

sentences.en: Online gaming allows players from around the world to challenge each other.
sentences.cn: 网络游戏使得全球的玩家可以相互较量。

sentences.en: She has danced, choreographed, lectured and taught all over the world.
sentences.cn: 她在世界各地跳过舞、编过舞、讲过学、也教过书。

sentences.en: She travels con-stantly, moving among her several residences around the world.
sentences.cn: 她经常旅行，穿梭于她在世界各地的多处住所。

sentences.en: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.cn: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.en: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.cn: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.en: The collision took place in the busiest shipping lanes in the world.
sentences.cn: 撞船事故发生在全世界最繁忙的航道上。

sentences.en: The heavyweight champion will be given a shot at Holyfield's world title.
sentences.cn: 这名重量级拳击冠军将尝试挑战霍利菲尔德的世界冠军头衔。

sentences.en: the reigning Formula One world champion
sentences.cn: 一级方程式赛车现任世界冠军

sentences.en: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.cn: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentences.cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentences.en: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.cn: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.en: There were television crews and pressmen from all around the world.
sentences.cn: 来自世界各地的电视工作者和新闻记者齐聚一堂。

sentences.en: there's a world of difference between being alone and being lonely.
sentences.cn: 独自一人和孤独之间有很大的差别。

sentences.en: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.cn: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.en: We are selling the full range of World Cup merchandising.
sentences.cn: 我们出售世界杯的所有纪念商品。

phrases.tran_cn: 世界各地；全世界；环游世界

phrases.phrase: be not long for this world
come up (或 go down) in the world

phrases.tran_cn: （否定句内）无论如何；（肯定句内）每一方面都…

phrases.phrase: look for all the world like
phrases.tran_cn: ［用作强调］看起来简直一模一样
新世界（指西半球或南、北美洲及其附近岛屿）

phrases.phrase: not do something for the world

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)十全十美的，好得不可思议的

phrases.phrase: the best of both (或 all possible) worlds

phrases.tran_cn: (英)许多人；各色人等；所有的人

phrases.phrase: the world, the flesh, and the devil
phrases.tran_cn: 物质享受、肉欲与魔鬼（指造成人类罪孽的各种诱惑）
非常看重，十分钦佩（某人）
世界贸易组织（产生于关贸总协定的乌拉圭谈判， 其目的是为促进多边贸易谈判和协议而成立的。）

trans.tran_en: existing in, involving, or affecting all or most countries in the world

trans.tran_cn: 世界，国家，人类，人生，界，环境，星球
trans.tran_en: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it
the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it
